name: The Pixel Medic
description:
Equipped with a fully working defibrilator, you are ...

Your goal: Rescue as many NPCs as possible in the given time limit! But be in hurry: They will explode, if you don't rescue them in time!

This game will enjoy you with fast gameplay, retro pixel graphics and old-school sound effects!

Find the most recent gameplay video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E6ziJlW7cWA

The game is and will be completely free.

"The Pixel Medic" is under active development and not finished yet.
